game.name: Pixel Builder
game.categories: Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: 픽셀 모델을 빠르게 만들기 위한 픽셀 모델 편집기. 2D 픽셀 슬라이스를 층층이 쌓아 3D 픽셀 모델을 구축하며, PNG, GIF 애니메이션 및 OBJ 3D 모델로 내보내기를 지원합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A pixel model editor for quickly creating pixel models. Build 3D pixel models layer by layer through stacking 2D pixel slices, with support for exporting to PNG, animated GIF, and OBJ 3D models.
